sentence.Network_en: The relation between the filter sampling time and cutting error is fuzzed.

sentence.Network_en: He fuzzed up the plot line with a lot of emotional nonsense.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用许多无聊的感情描述把故事情节弄乱了.

sentence.Network_en: His head fuzzed like a dandelion gone to seed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他头上全是绒毛,就像接籽的蒲公英.
